form.searchTemplate: index=esg_transaction AND WorkflowName!=NULL | soaekv | search /logEntry/body/subEntry/body/transactionStart/workflowName = $suser$ | chart sum(/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/requestSize) AS request_Size, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/requestSize") AS Invoke0_requestSize, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/responseSize") AS Invoke0_responseSize, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[1]/requestSize") AS Invoke1_requestSize, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[1]/responseSize") AS Invoke1_responseSize, sum(/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/responseSize) AS response_Size by "/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/protocol/address" | sort 10 -request_Size
